Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 030186 PPY, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the disposition of two city-owned properties, located in Community Board 1, Borough of Staten Island, Council District no. 49 and Community Board 1, Council District no. 1, Borough of Manhattan.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
